mapper.select: SELECT A.COMPANY_CD , A.DIVISION_CD , A.GR_NO , A.GR_SEQ , A.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID , A.IO_TYPE , A.IO_TYPE_NM , A.ITEM_ID , A.ITEM_NM , A.ITEM_SPEC , A.ITEM_TYPE , A.ITEM_TYPE_NM , A.RECEIPT_DATE , A.GR_QTY , A.GR_UOM , A.GR_UOM_NM , A.CONVERSION_QTY , A.CONVERSION_UOM , A.CONVERSION_UOM_NM , A.RETURN_QTY , A.GR_QTY - NVL(A.RETURN_QTY, 0) AS REMAIN_QTY , 0 AS RETURN_REQUEST_QTY , A.CURRENCY_CD , A.CURRENCY_NM , A.EXCHANGE_RATE , A.PARTNER_CD , A.PARTNER_NM , A.RETURN_WAREHOUSE_CD , A.RETURN_WAREHOUSE_NM , A.REFERENCE_NO , A.REFERENCE_DTL_NO , A.KEY_ID FROM (SELECT MPD.COMPANY_CD , MPD.DIVISION_CD , MPD.INOUT_NO AS GR_NO , MPD.SEQ AS GR_SEQ , MPD.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID , MPD.IO_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_IO_TYPE_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, MPD.IO_TYPE) FROM DUAL) AS IO_TYPE_NM , MPD.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(MPD.RECEIPT_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RECEIPT_DATE , MPD.INOUT_QTY AS GR_QTY , MPD.INOUT_UOM AS GR_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, MPD.INOUT_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS GR_UOM_NM , MPD.CONVERSION_QTY , MPD.CONVERSION_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, MPD.CONVERSION_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS CONVERSION_UOM_NM , (SELECT SUM(PID.INOUT_QTY) FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_DTL PID WHERE PID.COMPANY_CD = MPD.COMPANY_CD AND PID.DIVISION_CD = MPD.DIVISION_CD AND PID.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID = MPD.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID) AS RETURN_QTY , MPD.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MPD.CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MPD.EXCHANGE_RATE , MPM.VENDOR_CD AS PARTNER_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PARTNER_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD, MPM.DIVISION_CD,MPM.VENDOR_CD) FROM DUAL) AS PARTNER_NM , MPM.WAREHOUSE_CD AS RETURN_WAREHOUSE_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_LOCATION_NAME(MPM.COMPANY_CD, MPM.DIVISION_CD, MPM.WAREHOUSE_CD) FROM DUAL) AS RETURN_WAREHOUSE_NM , MPD.REFERENCE_DTL_NO , MPD.REFERENCE_NO , ROWIDTOCHAR(MPD.ROWID) AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_MST MPM , MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_DTL MPD , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MPM.COMPANY_CD = MPD.COMPANY_CD AND MPM.DIVISION_CD = MPD.DIVISION_CD AND MPM.INOUT_NO = MPD.INOUT_NO AND MPD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.RECEIPT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{grDateSD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{grDateED, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 AND MPM.VENDOR_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.IO_TYPE IN ( SELECT MIC.IO_TYPE FROM MOM_IO_CATEGORY MIC WHERE MIC.COMPANY_CD = MPD.COMPANY_CD AND MIC.DIVISION_CD = MPD.DIVISION_CD AND MIC.PUR_RECEIVE_YN = 'Y' AND MIC.USE_YN = 'Y' ) ) A WHERE A.GR_QTY - NVL(A.RETURN_QTY,0) > 0 ORDER BY A.GR_NO , A.GR_SEQ
